text:
Upgrade your bedroom with this stylish and attractive upholstered platform bed. This bed features a diamond tufting design that brings elegance and charm to any setting. Available in various colors, this bed is available in full, queen and king size, allowing you to choose the best fit for your room.

Set includes 1 headboard, 1 footboard, 2 side rails, and 1 complete set of Euro slats

Available in various colors

Diamond tufting design

Made with rubberwood, foam, and linen

Mattress required for use (not included)



Leg height: 4 inches

Headboard height: 52.6 inches high

Full size internal mattress opening: 55.3 inches wide x 75.6 inches long

Full size bed overall: 59.2 inches wide x 82.7 inches long x 52.6 inches high



Leg height: 4 inches

Headboard height: 52.6 inches high

Queen size internal mattress opening: 61.5 inches wide x 81.5 inches long

Queen bed overall: 65 inches wide x 88.6 inches long x 52.6 inches high



Leg height: 4 inches

Headboard height: 52.6 inches high

King size internal mattress opening: 78.7 inches wide x 81.5 inches long

King bed overall: 82.7 inches wide x 88.6 inches long x 52.6 inches high

Exquisite and inviting, iQ Classic encompasses traditional and transitional designs. Taking cues from time-honored craftsmanship, these pieces simultaneously draw from tried and true roots and contemporary elements. With a breadth of styles to choose from, transform your home into a welcoming haven with iQ Classic.At iNSPIRE Q® , our designer-curated lifestyles reflect current trends and timeless essentials, giving you the know-how to achieve your vision. With diverse style inspirations to choose from, you'll be able to find the one that speaks to you - or mix and match across collections for a style that's all your own.Whether you're cool and contemporary, retro, free-spirited, vintage, or classic iNSPIRE Q® is here to help you achieve the home of your dreams, every step of the way. Click here to explore the six style inspirations: iQ Bold, iQ Modern, iQ Classic, iQ Artisan, iQ Junior, and iQ Oasis.
